f3hw8u.title: Gas Prices by State
f3hw8u.description: View an interactive map showing which states have the highest and lowest gas prices.
f3hw8u.teaser: Gas in California is nearly double the cost compared to the Deep South.

wu2hsi.title: Amusement Parks by State
wu2hsi.description: View an interactive map showing the number of amusement parks in each U.S. state.
wu2hsi.teaser: Florida and Texas lead the country when it comes to the number of amusement parks while Wyoming has not one.

zylz14.title: Unemployment Rates by State
zylz14.description: View an interactive map showing which states have the highest and lowest unemployment rates.
zylz14.teaser: Unemployment remains consistently low in the Dakotas while it's crept up in western states like Nevada and California.

4nwov1.title: The Poorest States
4nwov1.description: View an interactive map showing the poverty rate by state.
4nwov1.teaser: New Hampshire and Utah have the lowest poverty rates while the Mississippi Delta region struggles with higher poverty rates.

qmlilr.title: Where Homes Cost the Most
qmlilr.description: View this map showing the median home price by county.
qmlilr.teaser: See which counties have the highest average home valuations according to Zillow.

o1ybhy.title: The Highest Income States
o1ybhy.description: This interactive map shows the median income by state.
o1ybhy.teaser: D.C. and several coastal states earn the most with median incomes nearly double some southeastern states.

ao2ukt.title: Highest Income Counties
ao2ukt.description: View an interactive map showing median household incomes by county.
ao2ukt.teaser: Four of the top ten highest earning counties are in Virginia, home to many well paid government contractors.
